about_the_game:
Join Family Adventures Paris and be part of an incredible journey! Meet the Millers, loving parents Peter and Emily, talented Jessica, and sporty Steven - as they travel to the French capital, exploring the beautiful streets and experiencing the culture, art, and history that Paris holds for them.

This vacation isn't just about walking and exploring. Get ready to turn on your brain and show your strategic skills by solving six different puzzletypes along the adventure of 50 mysteries. From exciting Match 3 challenges to tricky Hidden Object scenes, from challenging jigsaw puzzles to strategic Onet, Drag 'n Drop and Frogger. Each puzzle presents a unique call to test your observation, pattern recognition, and quick-thinking skills.

Once you successfully solve the puzzle, you'll unlock more and more details of the final exciting story waiting for you. Dive into Paris's rich and exciting atmosphere with beautifully created environments and memorable audio that transport you to famous monuments and breathtaking views.

Are you ready to join the Millers, push yourself to challenges, and enjoy the adventures waiting for you in the heart of Paris? The exciting world of Family Adventures in Paris invites you on this extraordinary journey.



* Go on an adventure with the Millers
* Explore beautiful Paris
* More than 50 exciting levels
* 6 different types of puzzles (Hidden Object, Match 3, Jigsaw puzzles, Onet, Drag 'n Drop and Frogger)
* Unlock the final bonus chapter

name: Family Adventures Paris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
